question.body: Blood drained from the myocardium returns to the right atria via the __________.

response.feedback: Correct. The blood drains first into the cardiac veins which empty into the coronary sinus.
Incorrect. The superior vena cave drains blood from most structure superior to the diaphragm, except the heart and alveoli.
Incorrect. The inferior vena cava drains blood from structures below the diaphragm.
Incorrect. The jugular vein drains blood from the head and neck.
